command: until nc -vz ${POD_NAME}.${POD_NAMESPACE} 80; do echo "Waiting for omnirpc..."; sleep 1; done;

command: until nc -vz ${POD_NAMESPACE}-clickhouse 9000; do echo "Waiting for clickhouse..."; sleep 1; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-clickhouse
